JOB DESCRIPTION: In this role,  you have the opportunity to    To work on connectivity gateway solutions based on Mobile and Device hub,  I    You are responsible for    Own test case development and peer review process on the responsible area    Own test case execution process and generate test reports on the responsible area     Support test lead in preparing Test strategy and plan for test activities of the Project     Performs the role of a specialist by reviewing work products     Use/Propose to team on suitable test design technique     Technical communication with leads/stakeholders     Contribute in Test Automation to enhance productivity for the assigned features    To succeed in this role,  you should have the following skills and experience    Experience: 6- 8 years with proven track record    Highly skilled iOS/Swift developer     Quality driven: TDD and BDD skills be able to extend the current Java/Cucumber test project     DevOps / Continuous Integration and Testing skills     Be able to integrate automatic testing     Be able to automate new test cases     Very communicative as we are working multi- site     Pro: ISTQB Foundation of Software Testing certified     Pro: Be able to create / write medical documentation (using QMS)     Pro: Knowledge about Google Protocol Buffers / PC or be able to gain the knowledge    o Be able to add gRPC- server to iOS test apps   o Be able to define new test interfaces where needed
